## Introduction

This is a spectrogram based model for detecting humpback whales developed by a collaboration between Google and NOAA.

Note that this model is also available as an example model within PAMGuard.

![Google humpback whale classifier running in PAMGuard](./google_humpback_pacific/humpback_whale_google_screenshot.png)

## Species

1.  Humpback whale (Megaptera novaeangliae)

## Geographic location of training data

Pacific ocean

## Reference

A. N. Allen et al., ‘A Convolutional Neural Network for Automated Detection of Humpback Whale Song in a Diverse, Long-Term Passive Acoustic Dataset’, Front. Mar. Sci., vol. 8, p. 607321, Mar. 2021 https://doi.org/10.3389/fmars.2021.607321
